we are offering 2 dates for the test

You can register for the module via MTS until May 31 2024. If you attend at the exercise and submit reports, you must take part in the written test on one of these two days, otherwise you will get 0% for the written test.

For
 planning purposes please confirm your participation at one of these two
 examination days using the small survey Choice on ISIS, see below.
Resources such as slides, scripts, exercise sheets, etc. are not permitted. A computer/laptop is not needed.

Please choose one of the two days offered for the written test. You can update your choice until July 24.
